name: Color Motivation
description:
Color Motivation tells a tale of a missing color adventure.
Our hero, dwells in the surreal chaos where he tries to find the colors that compose our light perception. A game that represents a way to repair a world without color. Repairing the RGB, from the end to the beginning. 

Team:
Game Design and Programming: Adrian Manica, André Leite, João Patricio, Pedro Centeno, Torstein Nesheim, Victor Gomes
Sound Design: Afonso Vieira
Visual Artists: Renata Candeias, Sónia Costa
Fonts used: “Amatic” “Amatic Bold” and “Amatic Regular” Copyright (c) 2011 by vernon adams (vern@newtypography.co.uk),

Created in less than 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2020. 
Built in Unity.
